abstract: Sergey Brin, the Google co-founder, and his wife, Anne Wojcicki, co-founder of 23andMe, donated $500,000 to the Wikimedia Foundation, the non-profit group that runs Wikipedia. Google and Wikipedia have not always been friends.
snippet: Sergey Brin, the Google co-founder, and his wife, Anne Wojcicki, co-founder of 23andMe, donated $500,000 to the Wikimedia Foundation, the non-profit group that runs Wikipedia. Google and Wikipedia have not always been friends.
lead_paragraph: Keep an eye on Sergey Brin’s Wikipedia page. It might just get a more positive spin soon.

headline.main: Brin and Wojcicki Give $500,000 to Charity Behind Wikipedia
